hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn 'Umar:A man told the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) that he was being deceived in business transactions. The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) then said: When you make a bargain, say: There is no attempt to deceive. So when the man made a bargain, he said: There is no attempt to deceive

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يَقُولُ فِي الْبَيْعِ لاَ خِلاَبَةَ
chapter.eng-name: If A Man Says When Buying And Selling: No Deception
